name: Team Great Escape
description:
You are a standard, generic adventurer named Protagonist McProtagonistguy who has been trapped in a jail by am underling who calls himself Microwave Dad. He lets you go free but you must still navigate the prison of dreary sadness you are trapped in to escape. Along the way you meet and free other prisoners including the cute but icy Princess Puddin’ Pop, the toxic Sasquatch the Megasquirrel, and Jeff. Princess Pudding Pop rules the freezer aisle and has the power to freeze enemies, boredom consolidated into a solid form called boredoms, in place. Sasquatch the Megasquirrel is the prince of the Cuyahoga River and, due to pollution, has mutated to shoot a laser out of his tail. Jeff… well Jeff is Jeff. Explore the prison to find all the royals and help them work together as a team to break out of prison!

Gameplay: WASD to move, click or O to shoot, E to interact
